Package it.unipr.sowide.actodes.executor.passive

Class OldScheduler

java.lang.Object
it.unipr.sowide.actodes.actor.Behavior
it.unipr.sowide.actodes.executor.Executor<A>
it.unipr.sowide.actodes.executor.passive.Scheduler<OldActor>
it.unipr.sowide.actodes.executor.passive.OldScheduler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public final class OldScheduler
extends Scheduler<OldActor>
The OldScheduler class uses the "cooperative scheduling" mechanism for executing OldActor actors.
See Also:
OldActor, Serialized Form
